Uses of Interface
org.picocontainer.gems.jmx.DynamicMBeanProvider

Packages that use DynamicMBeanProvider
org.picocontainer.gems.jmx The package contains classes to expose components of PicoContainer with JMX. 
 

Uses of DynamicMBeanProvider in org.picocontainer.gems.jmx
 

Classes in org.picocontainer.gems.jmx that implement DynamicMBeanProvider
 class AbstractConstructingProvider
          A DynamicMBeanProvider that constructs StandardMBean instances that as long as an ObjectName and a MBeanInfo can be generated for the component.
 class DynamicMBeanComponentProvider
          DynamicMBeanProvider, that will provide a component directly if it is already a DynamicMBean.
 class NamingConventionConstructingProvider
          A DynamicMBeanProvider that constructs StandardMBean instances that follow the JMX naming conventions.
 class RegisteredMBeanConstructingProvider
          A DynamicMBeanProvider, that creates DynamicMBeans for registered Pico components on the fly.
 

Constructors in org.picocontainer.gems.jmx with parameters of type DynamicMBeanProvider
JMXExposed(ComponentAdapter<T> delegate, MBeanServer mBeanServer, DynamicMBeanProvider[] providers)
          Construct a JMXExposed behaviour
JMXExposing(MBeanServer mBeanServer, DynamicMBeanProvider[] providers)
          Construct a JMXExposingComponentFactory.
JMXVisitor(MBeanServer server, DynamicMBeanProvider[] providers)
          Construct a JMXVisitor.
